lead_paragraph: Sven Kramer of the Netherlands won the men’s 5,000-meter race yesterday at the season-opening World Cup speedskating event in Heerenveen, the Netherlands. Kramer finished in 6:16.64. In the men’s 1,000, Lee Kyou-hyuk of South Korea won in 1:09.01. Anni Friesinger of Germany added the women’s 1,500 title to the 1,000 she won Friday.
